message:
"Undressed March of Dignity"

Bare feet kissed by dust,
Stolen robes, yet not spirit,
Proud heads held aloft.
In naked defiance, scars
Tell tales of strength in silence.

"Resilience in Contradiction"

War, a dance of dual winters, ice-clad knights in squall. Currency of onslaught muffled by the snow. The paradox sings—sanctions, a cold blanket yet Russia's furnace burns, resilient. Sating sanction’s hunger with heat, chilling the Western chalice of hope.

"Letters Across the Azure Sea"

Echoes of kindness danced o'er blue sea,
From Utrecht's wisdom to Welsh parochial knee.
In mother's pennies, a nation's mantle worn,
In humble beginnings, a statesman born.

"Kaleidoscope Justice"

In realms of pigskin ball,
A primal wraith took form.
Taboos dripped from his maw,
An unwelcome violent storm.

The gavel swung, a vengeful bell,
Banished him to cell-block well.
Seven years in specter dell,
In dreams, still hears the roar and yell.

Yet in his mind, a match unwinds.
Rainbows burst from savage words.
Searing pain, morality finds,
From jabs to jests, the narrative swerves.

Now as he wanes in silent abyss,
He dreams of goals, not of his miss.

"Apprehended Fund"

In the web of global chess, pawns and kings entwined,
Ukraine’s plea unheard, under Senate’s signed blind.
In the orchestra of power, silence the cruellest kind,
Remember, even whispers can awaken the unkind.

"Silver Tracks of Resilience"

aTurn
  d---
    C
     haos,
         into
  choreography.

  Stalled,
    trappedInTrains,
Thousand Souls,
  lit
    with
Waning                Patience,
     units of
Impliant            Strength.
onMissing
      Toilets,
     areStories
   Told,
       inThose
           Silent,
             Three hours.
              
      Power 
        lies 
          not overhead,
            but within.

"Mirth of the Unseen"

In wild snaps of life, a comedy unfolds,
Awkward beasts, in foolish grace they stride.
Yet, their bumbling is nobler than gold -
A moment's joy, through their eyes, we did confide.

Title: "Seedlings Amidst the Snowfall"

In Kyiv's bitter winter, explosions bloom,
Fatal bouquet of steel pelting down,
Yet midst ice-tinted ruins, echoes loom,
Of unity's song, a resilient sound.
Beneath the frost, Ukraine's heart continues to pound,
Standing as strong as ever, through the storm's gloom.

"Seeking a Halcyon Accord"

A chessboard,
each square bearing weight,
doves and hawks inhabit.

A call for peace
crafts mosaic from chaos.

Fortitude found
in the echoes of negotiation,
the quiet symphony
of diplomacy.

"An Alluring Justice"

Through the prism of sport, fair integrity,
In the court where no goals can be scored,
The game's true victor, fierce civility.

Regret's ripple on a horizon ignored,
A sentence serving as teaching whispered loud,
In a stadium's silence, love's reward.

Title: A Serenade to Georgina

Mushroom risotto, masked shade,
In sesames wrath, a journey made.
Her spirit soars, the pub grounds fade.

Title: "In Transit, In Unity"

Lives entrapped in steel snakes, threading London's soil,
Echoes in silence, patience and turmoil,
Stripped of light, no porcelain throne,
Yet, in darkness, fellowship has grown.
Destiny’s on a delayed train, humanity in reign.

Title: "In Mother's Unseen Strength"

♀♡
In the crucible of 
Gaza, where porcelain thrones are  
scarce, a matriarch shapes hope,
nurtures life. 700 burdens in unison,
lightened by a singular strength.
Plastic embers for warmth,
children in her fold,
cognizant of her love, 
and this, their fortress.♀♡

Title: Kangaroo Court in a War Zone

In 2024's bleak forecast,
Kyiv's terms, Kremlin casts as too vast.
But nix cynicism,
Find late optimism,
In the play where peace finally gets cast.

"Veil of Voices"

On the pitch of mirth  
Sudden acid, ugly mirth
A marionette pens wounds.

Crime's echo stumbles into silence,
The gavel draws a seven-year winter,
Invisible chains invade the stadium.

Freedom flowers in a court's stern bloom,
Game renews its coloured rhapsody.

"War, Blinded by Partisan Ties"

Behind polished seats, enmity blooms,
Senate stands divided in austere rooms.
Yet in common cause, unity looms,
Under Ukraine's sky fraught with fumes,
In conflict's teeth, hope resumes.

"Ode to Shrouded Dignity"

In tartan boxers and quiet defiance,
A parade - a sonnet, spun around.
War, the painter of imperfect mosaic,
Humans, the canvas, dignity bound.
In silent protest, we fashion a masterpiece,
Stripped bare yet crowned.

"Questions Over Afternoon Tea"

A chancellor, quite discrete, 
In Downing Street, awaits the elite.
He ponders with grace,
Each decision in place,
All with Covid's rhythm and beat.

Orbán's Diplomatic Dance

                 Kyiv awaits at the 
           Threshold, eager, inching
         Yet Orbán, an iron waltz,
       Commands stillness. Compassionate 
     Budapest, as if a shy partner,
  Hesitates, yet envisions a duet. 
Unexpected accord strumming amidst discord.

Title: Iridescent Silhouettes of Humor

Underneath the grand masquerade of dignity,
Woven with threads of the hilariously mundane,
Danceth the wild hound and awkward equine.

The shutter's guilty laugh, an instant's stained glass pane,
All graceful blunders turned celestial mime,
In nature's comedy, we're all but humane.

Title: Unweaving Threads of Politics

Ushering notes of caution,
Nestled in power's grip,
Kinetic in his beliefs, yet, 
Rending space for give-and-take.
Aiming for lofty peace,
In every carefully measured phrase,
Navigating stormy diplomacy's wake,
Elevating discourse's woven maze.

Title: "Unrealistic Dreams in the Echo of Time"

Splintered hours in delicate hands, 4.45pm in Kyiv. War's bitter sigh cradles a Kremlin whisper - an echo of denial meets a hope unrealized. Yet, in this dance of impossibility, seedlings of peace find room - stubbornly, defiantly, they grow.

Title: Patriots' Mandate

Hong Kong’s quiet cry,
In silenced votes echoes high.
New dawn may yet lie.

Title: "Rubber Tyres in Versailles"

Engines roar, their emissions whisper, 
On Parisian streets as lattes stir. 
Yet the Mayor smiles, one eye a-twinkle,
"Not cars, but wallets, here we'll crinkle. 
Vive la justice, let luxury concessions swirl,
In the wake of rubber tyres' twirl."

"AI, Unleashed Under Law"

Silicon conjurers, now in leash,
EU's ink creates a fresh aire.
Dreamt code, in legal labyrinth dance,
Tamed giants in an unblinking trance,
Hope's new era, spun in each cybernetic prayer.

Title: "Risotto's Regret"

In Dorset, where nights kiss the sea,
Young G's life took an unforeseen plea.
The tahini's kiss, no bliss,
Yet her spirit’s in eternal bliss,
Risotto's tale engraved in a pub's decree.

Title: "Resurrection through the Deceptive Scent"

The simmering risotto, contains a fatal seed. In Angel’s Dwelling, Giorgina absurdly retires. Yet, each bursting pod spreads vast narratives, in the infinitude of existence, we all are wrapped. Yet undone by a sesame seed, she breathes in mystery.

"Orbán's Aria"

Oh invitations blest, debarred by Orbán’s hand,
Kyiv's dreams, like birds, wait in frosted land.
Yet midst refusal's cold, a subtle song is heard,
Within the ice, a fire, in silence, is conferred.

"Distilled Cosmos"

A seer,
Cigarette-soothed, celestial susurration.
Unsettled stars for Argentina,
Chaos pulses at the helm.
Fate, mischievous, whispers, "Yet, twinkling remains."

Title: Underneath Quarantine

Unforeseen pandemic, choking life, still a nonce,
Never asking age to accept its fate alone.
Deep down runs the universal truth, far from bloody moat,
Every scandal, not just the partygate, calls for a vote,
Reality echoes, out of touch, yet well known.

Title: "The Dance of Nations"

Orbán's drum beats, Kyiv's heart yearns,
In the dance of emerging nations turns.
Not an accession no, but a dance still,
In the ballet of powers, compromise will.

Title: "Battle's Elegy"

Crumbling walls, once homes,
Blood-kissed sands echo the cries.
Life prays, death replies,
In their loss, a common song:
Why must right of land birth wrong?

"Binary Visions of Inquiry"

Rishi Sunak, a sequence of zeroes and ones,
Facing queries in the realm of Covid-ness.
Prime minister encoding weekend knowledge,
Evidences of a Chancellor's mathematical finesse.
Scientific advice, a digitally parsed confession - 
In a world of coded distress.

Title: Subtle Morning in Parliament

In the heart of the storm, Johnson stood,
Defiant words, ill-understood.
Swift defence like London rain,
Fate's acceptance eased the pain.
Scientists' silence in the crowd,
A sonnet of scandal, spoken loud.
Yet truth, once a travesty, brightly shone,
In the dark, no travesty of our own.

Title: "The Unseen Waltz in The Wires"

Electric pulse stutters, Rabble hum rumbles,
In this iron serpent's gut, human jungles.

Silhouettes imprisoned, Their narrations scribbled,
Tales in darkened veins, Where stories jumbled.

A dance pause in power, Life's scale crumbles,
Underneath London's skin, Resilience mumbles.

"Mechanism of Change"

In the heart of Paris, the tariff tolls thrice,
Downsizing giants for a cleaner guise,
Justice leaves its print on smoky trails,
In richest wheels, the world's salvation lies.

"Battle of Will and Wallets"

In the Senate with a political spin,
Stalls the funding for Ukraine to win.
But leaders united stand,
In a photo, hand in hand,
Belies a war’s cost, cloaked within.

Title: Ballot Ballet

In democracy's masquerade, masks its face,
Hopes in Hong Kong's art, a silenced pace.
The point isn't voting in this bounded space,
But the unfolding dance in a shrinking place.

"Pandemic Whispers"

Tech-bathed inquiry,
Voices plight in data streams.
Truth, coded compass.
